thread.title: 'Musically gifted' schoolgirl born with stunted arm 'overjoyed' to be given specially-made ukulele by teacher so she can show off her George Formby skillsz

title: 'Musically gifted' schoolgirl born with stunted arm 'overjoyed' to be given specially-made ukulele by teacher so she can show off her George Formby skillsz
text:
Opinion helena top of formby ‘Musically gifted’ schoolgirl born with stunted arm ‘overjoyed’ to be given specially-made ukulele by teacher so she can show off her George Formby skills 
11-year-old Helena Pye thought she would never fulfil dream of playing an instrument until music teacher designed one especially for her BY ALEX WEST
